name: Jatin Narang
bio: SDE-1 at Social Beat | Full-Stack Developer | Passionate about building efficient systems and optimizing user experiences

details: Developed and deployed an automated cron job to streamline data ingestion from Excel sheets, significantly boosting the efficiency of campaign performance tracking.
Integrated interactive and real-time charts using ApexCharts.js to enhance campaign data visualization and empower data-driven decision-making for stakeholders.
Designed and implemented a dynamic 'Add Tracker' interface that allows users to effortlessly add, edit, and manage campaign entries, improving workflow efficiency.
Created a multithreaded Python script to process data from 800 consoles, reducing processing time significantly.
Streamlined data extraction using Python, Selenium, and Excel, enhancing operational workflows.
Improved Vue.js component reactivity, boosting user experience in the application.
Developed a fully responsive website using React.js for seamless experiences across devices.
Integrated Google Analytics for tracking user behavior and making data-driven decisions.
Built a mobile frontend with React Native for a consistent experience on both platforms.
Developed secure authentication using Node.js and JWT tokens.
Built a user-friendly dashboard displaying personal information and historical records.

projects.name: Instagram Clone (MERN Stack)
details: Developed a social media platform using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.
Implemented secure authentication with JWT for user login and session management.
Designed a clean UI for uploading, browsing, and sharing posts.
Created a personalized dashboard displaying user posts and interactions.

projects.name: MovieU
details: Built a movie discovery platform showcasing trending movies/TV shows using TheMovieDB API.
Optimized page loading using lazy loading for images.
Ensured a responsive UI for seamless desktop and mobile experiences.
